placeholder.reportedAgainstPlaceholder: Search, select in 3D or drop an object to set as Affected Item.
placeholder.resolvedByPlaceholder: Search, select in 3D or drop an object to set as Resolved by.
placeholder.resolvedItemsPlaceholder: Search, select in 3D or drop an object to set as Resolved Items.
placeholder.contextPlaceholder: Search or drop an object to set as Contexts.

lifecycle.create: Set the Issues as 'Draft' state to indicate you start to work on it.
lifecycle.assign: Set the Issues as 'To Do' state to allow assignees to work on it.
lifecycle.active: Set the Issues as 'In Work' state to indicate you are working on it.
lifecycle.review: Set the Issues as 'In Approval' state to allow the review of your fix.
lifecycle.closed: Set the Issues as 'Completed' state if everything has been fixed.
lifecycle.CREATE: Set the Issues as '{stateDisplayName}' state to indicate you start to work on it.
lifecycle.ASSIGN: Set the Issues as '{stateDisplayName}' state to allow assignees to work on it.
lifecycle.ACTIVE: Set the Issues as '{stateDisplayName}' state to indicate you are working on it.
lifecycle.REVIEW: Set the Issues as '{stateDisplayName}' state to allow the review of your fix.
lifecycle.CLOSED: Set the Issues as '{stateDisplayName}' state if everything has been fixed.
lifecycle.error: An error occurred, please refresh your page and retry.
lifecycle.notSupported: Only issues with same maturity state and same validation process can be promoted or demoted.

inProgressTooltip.title: Waiting approval from:
inProgressTooltip.multiSelectionTitle: The selected issues are waiting approvals from multiple reviewers.

approveModal.reasonRequired: Please provide a comment for your approval.

rejectModal.reasonRequired: Please provide a reason for your rejection.

paths.anyStateToClose: Allow to set the issue(s) as 'Completed' from any state by the owner/coordinator.

create.title: issue
create.templateApplyError: An error occurred when applying template '{name}'.
create.templateApplyWarningAttachments: Some attachments referenced by the template cannot be fetched, they won't be added.
create.templateApplyWarningRelated: Some related object(s) referenced by the template cannot be fetched, they won't be added.
create.issueApplyError: An error occurred when applying issue '{title} - {name}'.
create.required: Required field must not be empty.
create.creationFailed: An error occurred during the creation, please retry again.
create.classificationFailed: An error occurred while classifying the object
create.setAttributesFailed: An error occurred while setting the classification attributes
create.validationFailed: Some fields are not properly filled.
create.promotionFailed: An error occurred during the promotion.
create.uploadImagesFailed: An error occurred during the upload of images.

labels.title: Title
labels.titleHelper: A brief one-line summary of the issue.
labels.similarIssuesHelper: These existing issues have a similar title. It might be better to comment there instead of creating another similar issue.
labels.descriptionHelper: A detailed description of the issue.
labels.classificationHelper: One or more classifications used to identify the issue.
labels.resolutionRecommendationHelper: A recommendation to explain how this issue should be fixed.
labels.priorityHelper: The importance of the issue in relation to other issues.
labels.priorityHelperUrgent: Urgent: Highest priority. Indicates that this issue takes precedence over all others.
labels.priorityHelperHigh: High: Indicates that this issue is causing a problem and requires urgent attention.
labels.priorityHelperMedium: Medium: Indicates that this issue has a significant impact.
labels.priorityHelperLow: Low: Indicates that this issue has a relatively minor impact.
labels.dueDateHelper: The date by which this issue should be completed.

labels.reportedAgainstshortHelper: Add one or more objects for which the issue is manifesting.
labels.reportedAgainstlongHelper: For example, you can add documents, engineering and manufacturing objects, tasks or even pictures (at target)
labels.reportedAgainstPlaceholder: Search, select in 3D or drop an object to set as Affected Item.
labels.contextshortHelper: Add one or more objects to provide more details about the context of the issue.
labels.contextlongHelper: For example, an issue has a document can have a project as the context, an engineering part could have a parent model as the context.
labels.contextPlaceholder: Search or drop an object to set as Context.

related.removeErrorNoSelection: Please select some objects to be removed.
related.addBalloonAvailable: Pick a precise element in the 3D to add it to the issue.
related.addBalloonNotAvailable: Pick in 3D feature is only available from 'Issue 3D Review'.
related.alreadyReportedAgainst: This object has already been added, please select another one.
related.dropError: Some dropped objects are not supported.
related.selectContextIn3D: Pick a precise element in the 3D to select context for the issue.
related.contextMultiError: Adding multiple objects in context is not supported.

labels.ownerHelper: The person owns the issue, and has all responsibilities.
labels.coOwnersHelper: Coordinators have the same responsibilities as the owner, but no permission to delete.
labels.assigneesHelper: Assignees can view, edit and resolve the issue.
labels.contributorHelper: Contributors can view and evaluate the issue.
labels.informedUserHelper: Informed Users can view the Issue and are notified of updates.
labels.reportingOrganizationHelper: Set the organization reporting of this issue.
labels.responsibleOrganizationHelper: Set the organization responsible of this issue.

team.cannotAddOwnerAsCoOwner: You cannot add the owner as a coordinator.

labels.attachmentsshortHelper: Add one or more additional information to help the analysis of the issue.
labels.attachmentslongHelper: For example, this can be a picture or documents related to the subject such as a request for proposal document or news articles
labels.attachmentsPlaceholder: Upload/drop a file, search/drop a 3DEXPERIENCE object or take an annotated screenshot button to create and add a new attachment.
labels.attachmentsPlaceholderNotAvailable: Upload/drop a file or search/drop a 3DEXPERIENCE object to create and add a new attachment.

attachments.screenshotNotAvailable: Screenshot feature is only available from 'Issue 3D Review'.
attachments.removeErrorNoSelection: Please select some documents to be removed.

labels.templateOverwrite: An existing Template with same name will be overwritten.

finalize.enableApproval: Enable the approval to ensure validation and review of this issue.
finalize.assignContentOwner: Assign automatically content owner to the Issue.
finalize.saveAsTemplateToggle: Save the Issue as a reusable template.

treeList.placeholder: No template available, create a new template.

shared.title: Issue shared template - {owner}
shared.description: This document contains an issue shared template.

confirmDelete.sharedInfo: The shared template(s) that you don't owned will be removed only from your list.
confirmDelete.sharedWarning: The shared template(s) that you owned will be removed from all users.

errors.remove: An error occurred when removing templates, please refresh your page and retry.

errors.classificationApplyTemplateFailed: Class '{ClassNames}' is used in the template but is no longer available for new Issues.  Update the template to remove this class.

notifications.sharedSuccess: This template has been shared, and a shareable URL has been generated.
notifications.sharedTemplateAdded: A shared template has been successfully added to your template list.
notifications.sharedTemplateNotValid: This shared template is not valid anymore. It has not been added to your template list.
notifications.sharedTemplateAlreadyAdded: This shared template is already in your template list.
notifications.sharedTemplateNotAdded: An error occurred while adding the shared template, please refresh your page and retry.
notifications.sharedTemplateURL: The shared template URL has been copied to your clipboard.

labels.nothing: Nothing to open, please select another object.

open.error: An error occurred while opening the selected object(s), please refresh and retry.

close.nothing: There are no issues to set as 'Completed'.
close.warning: Are you sure you want to set these issues as 'Completed'?
close.closable: Setting the following Issues as 'Completed' will prevent any modification, unless reopened:
close.indelible: The following Issues are already completed:

reopen.nothing: There are no issues to reopen.

reopen.indelible: The following Issues are not yet set as 'Completed':

delete.nothing: There are no issues to delete.
delete.warning: Are you sure you want to delete this content?

delete.deletePrivilege: Only Admin User can remove the finished route.

duplicate.content: The following Issues will be duplicated (the duplicated Issues will be under your ownership in 'Draft' state):

duplicate.keepRelated: Keep existing affected items and context in duplicated issues
duplicate.keepAttachments: Keep existing attachments in duplicated issues
duplicate.replaceHelp: Provide part of title to be replaced as a string or regular expression followed by string to be replaced with. Both parts will be separated by :. e.g. [a-z]*:Test will replace all small case strings in title with Test
duplicate.suffixHelp: Provide string to suffix Title of duplicated issues
duplicate.prefixHelp: Provide string to prefix Title of duplicated issues
duplicate.iteratorHelp: Provide the part of title to be incremented after duplication as string or regular expression. Numeric part will be incremented
duplicate.confirmMsg: The issue {title} will be duplicated as

states.create: Issue is receiving details before being assigned.
states.assign: Issue has been assigned and is waiting to be worked on.
states.active: Issue is being worked on by the assignees.
states.review: The proposed solution is being reviewed.
states.closed: Solution is accepted by the creator and the issue is set as 'Completed'.

states.create: Issue is receiving details before being assigned.
states.assign: Issue has been assigned and is waiting to be worked on.
states.active: Issue is being worked on by the assignees.
states.review: The proposed solution for the issue is being reviewed.
states.closed: Solution is accepted by the creator and the issue is set as 'Completed'.

shortcut.enter: Go to next Issue in Summary view/create new line in input field

mouse.ctrlClick: Select multiple items that you click/Unselect
mouse.shiftClick: Select all items in between your click
mouse.doubleClick: Open properties panel/Expand or Collapse item

templateIndelible: The following template(s) cannot be deleted, they are not in {state} state or not owned by you:
templateNothingToDel: There are no templates to delete
templateMigrationMsg: Your issue templates are being migrated to a new format.
templateMigrationSubMsg: Please do not close the browser or delete the widget.
templateHelper_private: Template visible to owner and shared user
templateHelper: Click to display the help for 'Issue Templates'.
completionNotAllowed: Completion is not allowed on selected issues.
draftStateToClose: Allow to set the issue(s) as 'Completed' from any state by the owner.
confirmQuestion: Do you want to duplicate the issue?
creationDraft: Issue '{title}' is created in 'Draft' state as an approval is required to move to 'To Do' state.
customViewSettingsShortHelp: The Contents tab lists content in Table View only.
customViewSettingsLongHelp: The columns that appear depend on the type of content you select and the selected columns in the Custom Views panel. You can also move columns to different locations, pin columns, and resize columns.
addAffectedItemShortHelp: Add items related to a specific point of attention.
addAffectedItemLongHelp: For example, a physical product that requires an update.
addContextsShortHelp: Add items that provide a better understanding of the issue.
addContextsLongHelp: For example, you can add a 3D object to see the full context of the object specified as an Affected Item.
addResolvedItemsShortHelp: Add fixed items resulting from the resolution of the issue.
addResolvedItemsLongHelp: For example, the new revision of an object specified as an Affected Item.
addResolvedbyShortHelp: Allows you to resolve the issue.
addResolvedbyLongHelp: You can specify a new task or a new change action as the resolved by object.
pickAffectedItemShortHelp: Pick the items related to a specific point of attention.
pickAffectedItemLongHelp: For example, a physical product that requires an update.
pickContextsShortHelp: Pick items that provide a better understanding of the issue.
pickContextsLongHelp: For example, you can add a 3D object to see the full context of the object specified as an Affected Item.
pickResolvedItemsShortHelp: Pick fixed items resulting from the resolution of the issue.
pickResolvedItemsLongHelp: For example, the new revision of an object specified as an Affected Item.
assigntoselfShortHelp: You can assign an issue to yourself.
assigntoselfLongHelp: The Assign to Self icon only appears in the Members tab if you are not already the assignee.
addShortHelp: Allows you to add users and user groups to an issue.
addLongHelp: Click inside the responsibility field that you want to assign to a member, start entering the name of the person or user group, and then select the name from the list.
removeShortHelp: Remove a user or a user group from an issue.
removeLongHelp: At the prompt, click Yes to confirm. A 3DNotification is sent to the user you removed.
filterShortHelp: Enter the name of the member to find.
filterLongHelp: As you enter the name of the user, the member list displays members who match the search criteria.
propagateShortHelp: Copies members and their responsibilities to selected issues.
propagateLongHelp: If you select multiple issues in the Issue Summary page, it allows you to copy members and their responsibilities to the selected issues. You cannot propagate an issue Owner.
createLongHelp: Issue templates allow users to report issues faster and more effectively on the 3DEXPERIENCE platform.
fromIssueShortHelp: You can create a new issue template from an existing issue.
fromIssueLongHelp: Select the issue from which you want to create a template.
cloneLongHelp: The New Template(s) panel appears with data from the template that you selected.
editLongHelp: To edit a template, the template must be in the Personal maturity state.
deleteLongHelp: Only the template owner or administrator can delete an issue template. The template must be in the Personal maturity state.
shareLongHelp: Only the template owner or an administrator can share a template.
customizeDatagridViewShortHelp: Allows you to configure how templates are displayed.
customizeDatagridViewLongHelp: The Table View Configuration panel allows you to (for example), show, hide, rename, sort and pin columns.
approvalsShortHelp: You can use the basic or approval workflow to resolve issues.
approvalsLongHelp: The Add a validation process for new issues to enforce the approval or rejection of the promotion of an issue once it has been analyzed or reviewed setting determines which workflow is used.
duplicateIssueLongHelp: You can duplicate an existing issue as a shortcut for creating a new issue.
markAsCompleteShortHelp: When you finish the work required to resolve an issue, you can promote it to the Completed maturity state.
markAsCompleteLongHelp: The resolution of the issue could involve design changes, analysis reports, or other activities. Or, the issue might have been created by mistake or become unnecessary, in which case you can use Cancelled as the completion type.
moveIssueShortHelp: Moves issues to another collaborative space.
moveIssueLongHelp: You can move issues to another collaborative space and organization, and you can change its owner.
moveTemplateShortHelp: Allows you to move a template to a new collaborative space and/or organization.
moveTemplateLongHelp: The Move panel also allows you to change the owner and add a message to the move action.
attachmentsCommandLongHelp: You can add attachments to an issue to further describe the issue, use as reference material, or assist in the resolution of an issue.
subscriptionShortHelp: Subscribe to issues so that you are notified when certain events occur.
subscriptionLongHelp: You can Subscribe, Unsubscribe, Edit, and View your subscriptions.
subscribeLongHelp: You can subscribe to issues so that you are notified when certain events occur. For example, When you subscribe to an issue event such as maturity transition, the 3DEXPERIENCE platform notifies you whenever that event occurs for that specific issue.
unsubscribeLongHelp: You are no longer notified when certain events occur to an issue.
editSubscriptionShortHelp: You can specify the issue events that you want to be notified about.
editSubscriptionLongHelp:
Select any of the following issue events to receive notifications. To stop receiving these notifications, clear the associated check box:
- Add Affected Item
- Remove Affected Item
- Add Resolved By
- Remove Resolved By
- Maturity Transition
mySubscriptionsShortHelp: Lists all issues and events to which you are subscribed.
mySubscriptionsLongHelp: Use the Find field to search for issues in the My Subscriptions panel. Enter a minimum of four characters and click Search.
deleteIssueLongHelp: You can only delete issues that you own and that are in the Draft maturity state.
deleteTemplatesLongHelp: The deletion is permanent. In the confirmation panel, click Delete to remove the template.
compareObjectsShortHelp: Enables you to identify differences between issues.
compareObjectsLongHelp: The main Compare toolbar provides commands for defining the app layout and comparison tools that apply to all the tabs.
removeObjectShortHelp: Removes the selected object from the Issue, but does not delete the object.
reportingOrganizationHelperShortHelp: Select the organization that is reporting the issue.
reportingOrganizationHelperLongHelp: This is the organization of the person creating the issue.
responsibleOrganizationHelperShortHelp: Select the organization that is responsible for resolving the issue.
responsibleOrganizationHelperLongHelp: This is the organization of the person resolving the issue.
reportedAgainstHelperShortHelp: Add one or more objects for which the issue is manifesting.
reportedAgainstHelperLongHelp: For example, you can add documents, engineering and manufacturing objects or more.
contextsHelperShortHelp: Add one or more objects to provide more details about the context of the issue.
contextsHelperLongHelp: For example, an issue has a document that can have a project as the context, an engineering part can have a parent model as the context.
attachmentsHelperShortHelp: Add attachments to further describe the issue, use as reference material, or assist in the resolution of an issue.
attachmentsHelperLongHelp: For example, this can be a picture or documents related to the issue.
ownerHelperShortHelp: Initially, the user who creates the issue and has all the permissions to manage the issue.
ownerHelperLongHelp: The ownership of the issue can be changed to another user.
coOwnersHelperShortHelp: User or users who are responsible for addressing the issue.
coOwnersHelperLongHelp: They can perform most actions on an issue, except delete.
assigneesHelperShortHelp: Users who are assigned tasks to resolve the issue.
assigneesHelperLongHelp: They can perform many actions on an issue in the To Do and In Work maturity state.
contributorHelperShortHelp: Additional users involved (such as reviewers) in resolving the issue.
contributorHelperLongHelp: They can duplicate an issue in any maturity state.
informedUserHelperShortHelp: Users who need to know about the status of an issue.
informedUserHelperLongHelp: The primary responsibility of the Informed User is viewing issues.
coOwnersShortHelp: User or users who are responsible for addressing the issue.
coOwnersLongHelp: They can perform most actions on an issue, except delete.
assigneesShortHelp: Users who are assigned tasks to resolve the issue.
assigneesLongHelp: They can perform many actions on an issue in the To Do and In Work maturity state.
contributorShortHelp: Additional users involved (such as reviewers) in resolving the issue.
contributorLongHelp: They can duplicate an issue in any maturity state.
informedUserShortHelp: Users who need to know about the status of an issue.
informedUserLongHelp: The primary responsibility of the Informed User is viewing issues.
changeOwnerShortHelp: Initially, the user who creates the issue and has all the permissions to manage the issue.
changeOwnerLongHelp: The ownership of the issue can be changed to another user.
replaceHelpShortHelp: You can change a set of characters from the title of the original when you create the duplicate.
replaceHelpLongHelp: Separate the original string from the new string with a colon. For example, if the original issue title has Wheel in the title and you want to replace with Brake, type Wheel:Brake.
suffixHelpShortHelp: Characters that are added at the end of the duplicate issue title.
suffixHelpLongHelp: For example, if you add _Design as a suffix to Brake Issue, the title of the duplicate issue will be Brake Issue_Design.
prefixHelpShortHelp: Characters that are added at the beginning of the duplicate issue title.
prefixHelpLongHelp: For example, if you add Design_ as a prefix to Brake Issue, the title of the duplicate issue will be Design_Brake Issue.
iteratorHelpShortHelp: Adds an incremental number to the title of the duplicate issue. Optionally, enter text or an expression as a prefix to the number.
classificationsFieldHelpText: Click Add to classify the issue to the selected classes.
collabSpaceHelperShortHelp: The storage location for the object.
collabSpaceHelperLongHelp: Lists the collaborative spaces where you are assigned a responsibility that allows you to do create this object type. If the required collaborative space is not listed, contact your administrator.
organizationHelperShortHelp: The Organization that owns the object.
organizationHelperLongHelp: Lists the associated organizations you work for, depending on the selected collborative space.
errorCreateIssueForRoleTitle: You cannot create this type of object : Issue.
errorCreateTemplateForRoleTitle: You cannot create this type of object : Template.
errorCreateIssueForRoleSubTitle: Verify that you are using the correct credentials.
errorCreateIssueForRoleMsg: You may not have the required access responsibility in the target collaborative space to create this type of object.
messageCreateDocument: You do not have permission to create documents, and you have limited access to features in this page.
caAsResolvedBy: New Change Action as Resolved By
resolvedByShortHelp: Allows you to resolve the issue.
resolvedByLongHelp: You can specify a new task or a new change action as the resolved by object.
createTaskShortHelp: Allows you to use a task as the Resolved By object.
createTaskLongHelp:
There are two types of tasks that you can create and add as resolved by:
- Project Management tasks
- Project Planning tasks
changeActionTitle: New Change Action as Resolved By
changeActionShortHelp: Allows you to use a change action as the Resolved By object.
changeActionLongHelp: The maturity state of the issue depends on the maturity state of the change objects used to resolve it.
addResolvedByUsingSearchShortHelp: Allows you to add an existing object as the resolved by object.
addResolvedByUsingSearchLongHelp: Use search to find the object you want to use as the resolved by object.
duplicateWrongReplaceEnter: Invalid string in the title modifier Replace field. Enter a valid string.
